FORGOT YOUR PASSWORD?

Please enter the e-mail address you used to enroll in a Udacity class and we will send you a link to reset your password.

Contact Us

We strongly advise first checking the CS101 FAQ / CS373 FAQ / General FAQ or the CS101 forum / CS373 forum for answers to your questions. Please use the forums for questions related to course content instead of sending emails with this form. Please do not send questions about homework through this form (e.g. issues related to grading, extensions, etc). We attempt to read all messages we receive, but apologize that we cannot respond to all of them.
